text: Nagri vahe'mota tamagazegu hu'nazanagi ante agofetu hu'na tami'nugeta rama'a zantami eri santiharegahaze. Tamazeri tamagaze hu'nazanagi, ranke huta zagamera huta ana fenozama tami'nua zantera musena hugahaze. E'ina hu'negu mopatamifina rama'a zantami eri agofetu huta erita manigahaze. Ana nehutma tusi'a muse nehanageno ana muse zamo'a vaga oreno mevava hugahie.
